#summary Designer Proof of Concept
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-QA,Featured

= Introduction =

This proof of concept aims to study the designer module creation.

= Current Status =

Finished.

= Details =

 * Designer tablet: Use QGraphicsView from !QtGui module.
 * Table creation and drag: Use QGraphicsItem from !QtGui module.
  * Use the QPainter::drawText(QRectF,int,QString) for text drawing.
  * For text size, use QGraphicsTextItem.
 * Connections: Use QGraphicsPathItem for line drawing
  * For line breaking (redesign), use mouseEvents and redraw the linePath (delete and reisert).
